title: #photos
text: Delivery and Set-Up of Post and Beam Log Shell
Main floor framed and ready for placing log posts
Concrete piers at location of free-standing log posts
Installing exterior spiral stair and upper deck railings
Closeup of spiral stair tread connections to center post
Upper floor joist connecting to double beam, with slot cut for floor sheathing
Connection of single beam to double beam at deck corner
Concrete block footing for rock piers on outside wall
Log truss work over upper deck
Complete log shell (spiral stair is wrapped in black plastic)
